[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["Use React Developer Tools to inspect React ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/your-first-component","children":"components"}],", edit ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/passing-props-to-a-component","children":"props"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/state-a-components-memory","children":"state"}],", and identify performance problems."]}]}],"
",["$r","YouWillLearn",null,{"children":["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"How to install React Developer Tools"}],"
"]}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"browser-extension","children":"Browser extension "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The easiest way to debug websites built with React is to install the React Developer Tools browser extension. It is available for several popular browsers:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/react-developer-tools/fmkadmapgofadopljbjfkapdkoienihi?hl=en","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["Install for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Chrome"}]]}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/react-devtools/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["Install for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Firefox"}]]}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/react-developer-tools/gpphkfbcpidddadnkolkpfckpihlkkil","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["Install for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Edge"}]]}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Now, if you visit a website ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"built with React,"}]," you will see the ",["$r","em",null,{"children":"Components"}]," and ",["$r","em",null,{"children":"Profiler"}]," panels."]}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"/images/docs/react-devtools-extension.png","alt":"React Developer Tools extension"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"safari-and-other-browsers","children":"Safari and other browsers "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For other browsers (for example, Safari), install the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-devtools","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-devtools"}]}]," npm package:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"# Yarn
yarn global add react-devtools

# Npm
npm install -g react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Next open the developer tools from the terminal:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"react-devtools
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Then connect your website by adding the following ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<script>"}]," tag to the beginning of your websiteâ€™s ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<head>"}],":"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-html","meta":"{3}","children":"<html>
  <head>
    <script src="http://localhost:8097"></script>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Reload your website in the browser now to view it in developer tools."}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"/images/docs/react-devtools-standalone.png","alt":"React Developer Tools standalone"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"mobile-react-native","children":"Mobile (React Native) "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["To inspect apps built with ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native"}],", you can use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/docs/debugging/react-native-devtools","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native DevTools"}],", the built-in debugger that deeply integrates React Developer Tools. All features work identically to the browser extension, including native element highlighting and selection."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/docs/debugging","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Learn more about debugging in React Native."}]}],"
",["$r","blockquote",null,{"children":["
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For versions of React Native earlier than 0.76, please use the standalone build of React DevTools by following the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"#safari-and-other-browsers","children":"Safari and other browsers"}]," guide above."]}],"
"]}]]}]]
